sources.title: Utopia
sources.description: Utopia (also known as Atoll K and Robinson Crusoe Land) is last film Laurel and Hardy made together. It was filmed and produced in Europe.

metadata.Plot: Heading for a newly inherited island, the boys are shipwrecked and marooned on an atoll which has just emerged from the sea. Along with their cook, a stowaway and a girl who is fleeing her fiancé, they set up their own government on the atoll. Uranium is discovered and world powers begin fighting over ownership of the island.
metadata.Director: Léo Joannon, John Berry, Alfred J. Goulding
metadata.Writer: Monte Collins, Léo Joannon, John D. Klorer
metadata.Actors: Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, Suzy Delair
